mapper.sql: SELECT X.report_no, X.report_category, X.report_content, X.respondent_no , A.ask_no, U.user_no, U.user_nick, A.ask_title, X.report_date, X.report_status FROM zask_report X INNER JOIN zask A ON X.ask_no = A.ask_no INNER JOIN zuser U ON U.user_no = A.user_no
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM zask_report WHERE ask_no = #{askNo } AND report_status = 'y'
SELECT count(*) FROM zask_report WHERE ask_no = #{askNo } AND report_status = 'n'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.ask_no, U.user_no, U.user_nick, A.product_no , I.item_brand, I.item_name, I.item_price, F.file_no, F.file_stored , A.ask_title, A.ask_content, A.ask_date, A.ask_hit , V.vote_start, V.vote_end , X.report_category, X.report_content FROM zuser U INNER JOIN zask A ON U.user_no = A.user_no INNER JOIN zitem I ON A.product_no = I.item_no INNER JOIN zfile F ON I.file_no = F.file_no INNER JOIN zvote V ON A.ask_no = V.ask_no INNER JOIN zask_report X ON A.ask_no = X.ask_no ORDER BY user_no ) ZASK WHERE ask_no = #{askNo }
